subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: After a contentious start, Bayern turned back California Chrome and held off Toast of New York down the stretch to give the Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert his first Classic victory.
snippet: After a contentious start, Bayern turned back California Chrome and held off Toast of New York down the stretch to give the Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert his first Classic victory.
